summary: This mod adds merchants outside the Whiterun Stables that deal in anything smithing related, such as ores, ingots, gems, soul gems and firewood. They have a vast stock of all of the types of ore and ingots always on hand to cater for the booming smithing trade.
descriptionHtml:
Note: This mod is no longer supported.

Description:
-----------------
This mod adds merchants outside the Whiterun Stables that deal in anything smithing related, such as ores, ingots, gems, soul gems and firewood. They have a vast stock of all of the types of ore and ingots always on hand to cater for the booming smithing trade.

I thought it would be good to finally not have to trek around all of the holds looking for something your local blacksmith doesn't stock. Garth and Nia, the merchants, make this possible with Garth's large regularly imported stock of all types of ore and ingots and Nia's ample supply of gems and soul gems.

Changelog:
---------------
- Added seperate gem merchant
- Moved merchants closer to main road
- Added merchant tent
- Added two books: 'Garth's Journal Volume 3' and 'Mines of Tamriel'
- Added two 'surprises' to merchants cart
- Changed quantites of merchandise (more leather)

Compatibility:
-------------------
Compatible with Whiterun Outskirts Market by RadioBoX,
the two go well together, it just improves the immersion by giving it the whole 'trade central' feel to the outside of Whiterun, meaning the ore and ingots merchant is where you would expect to find one.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11534

Compatible with Nernies City and Village Expansion

Installation:
----------------
NMM
or
Extract files, place the 'data' folder in your 'The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim' folder, merge the data folders when the option appears.


-------------------------------> Remember to endorse if you like it!
author: catfoodnomz
